references: Amending: Ord 57075. Repealing: Ord 70973, Ord 72651, Ord 72984
summary: An ordinance relating to membership in the City Employees Retirement System and amending Sections 1, 2, 4 and 6 of Ordinance No. 57075 to extend eligibility to membership as authorized by law; prescribing terms and conditions and repealing Ordinances Nos. 70973, 72651 and 72894.
